name: Knight Driver
overview: Knight Driver is a racing game that takes place on a closed circuit and is seen from an aerial perspective. The main goal is to steer the car along a series of circuits. There are two modes which can be played: Professional and Learner. In the Professional every time the car is driven off the road a life is lost; in Learner there's a time limit to play and the car can become increasingly and severely damaged while coursing off the road.
